verses.verse: My heart <S%H3820><s%> is steadfast, <S%H3559><s%> God. <S%H430><s%> I will sing <S%H7891><s%> and I will make music <S%H2167><s%> with my soul. <S%H3519><s%>
Wake <S%H5782><s%> up, <S%H5035><s%> harp and lyre! <S%H3658><s%> I will wake <S%H5782><s%> up the dawn. <S%H7837><s%>
I will give thanks <S%H3034><s%> to you, <S%H3068><s%> Yahweh, among the nations. <S%H5971><s%> I will sing praises <S%H2167><s%> to you among the peoples. <S%H3816><s%>
For your loving kindness <S%H2617><s%> is great <S%H1419><s%> above the heavens. <S%H8064><s%> Your faithfulness <S%H571><s%> reaches to the skies. <S%H7834><s%>
Be exalted, <S%H7311><s%> God, <S%H430><s%> above the heavens! <S%H8064><s%> Let your glory <S%H3519><s%> be over all the earth. <S%H776><s%>
That your beloved <S%H3039><s%> may be delivered, <S%H2502><s%> save <S%H3467><s%> with your right hand, <S%H3225><s%> and answer us. <S%H6030><s%>

God <S%H430><s%> has spoken <S%H1696><s%> from his sanctuary: <S%H6944><s%> "In triumph, <S%H5937><s%> I will divide <S%H2505><s%> Shechem, <S%H7927><s%> and measure out <S%H4058><s%> the valley <S%H6010><s%> of Succoth. <S%H5523><s%>
Gilead <S%H1568><s%> is mine. <S%H4519><s%> Manasseh is mine. <S%H669><s%> Ephraim also is my helmet. <S%H4581><s%> <S%H7218><s%> Judah <S%H3063><s%> is my scepter. <S%H2710><s%>
Moab <S%H4124><s%> is my wash <S%H7366><s%> pot. <S%H7993><s%> I will toss my sandal <S%H5275><s%> on Edom. <S%H123><s%> I will shout <S%H7321><s%> over Philistia. <S%H6429><s%>"
Who will bring <S%H2986><s%> me into the fortified <S%H4013><s%> city? <S%H5892><s%> Who has led <S%H5148><s%> me to Edom? <S%H123><s%>
Haven't <S%H2186><s%> you rejected us, <S%H430><s%> God? You don't <S%H3318><s%> go forth, God, <S%H430><s%> with our armies. <S%H6635><s%>
Give <S%H3051><s%> us help <S%H5833><s%> against the enemy, <S%H6862><s%> for the help <S%H8668><s%> of man <S%H120><s%> is vain. <S%H7723><s%>
Through God, <S%H430><s%> we will do <S%H6213><s%> valiantly. <S%H2428><s%> For it is he who will tread down <S%H947><s%> our enemies. <S%H6862><s%>
